data.text:
Morath, Inge; Arthur Miller (Introduction)

Portraits

New York: Aperture Foundation, 1986. First edition. Hardcover. 95pp. Quarto [29 cm]. 1/4 brown cloth over tan boards. Dust jacket is in near fine condition save having been price clipped. Title stamped in silver on spine. With two very small bumps on foot of boards. Very good +. Item #63716

Morath, the third wife of Arthur Miller and mother to Rebecca Miller, was born in Austria and began her career in the film industry, working with her camera alongside stars such as Audrey Hepburn and Marilyn Monroe. She later broke into the male dominated magazine Magnum Photos. Her work is marked by her commitment to travel and its distinctive surrealist quality.

Price: $30.00
